page.title: 08Education
page.content: Children start school at the beginning of term in which they are 5 years old and leave when they are 16 or 18 years.Schools in the area are (a) LINTON-ON-OUSE COUNTY PRIMARY SCHOOL,built in 1958,has about 60 children,3 teachers and 1 part time teacher. (b) NEWTON-ON-OUSE C.OF E.CONTROLLED SCHOOL,was built in the 19OOs at the expense of Payan and Lydia Dawnay. There are 7 children,1 teacher and 1 part time teacher.In 1986 Newton School is closing.The children will go to a new school,the Forest of Galtres School,being built in a neighbouring village.Children of Linton and Newton go to a comprehensive school at Easingwold at the age of 11. (c)Widdington children travel to Nun Monkton Primary School and Boroughbridge Secondary School.
